species.name: wyrdeer
descriptions: The black orbs shine with an uncanny light when the Pok√©mon is erecting invisible barriers. The fur shed from its beard retains heat well and is a highly useful material for winter clothing.

abilities.name: intimidate
abilities.effect: Lowers opponents' Attack one stage upon entering battle.

abilities.name: frisk
abilities.effect: Reveals an opponent's held item upon entering battle.

abilities.name: sap-sipper
abilities.effect: Absorbs grass moves, raising Attack one stage.
